title: Looking for Yasuo player to 1v1
body:
I'm looking for a Yasuo player to 1v1 regularly.

I'm an Ekko one trick, and I have trouble with the match up.
If you're interested in 1v1s, add: Lexhanatin.

You don't necessarily need to be a yas god. If you want to start learning yas in a less stressful environment, feel free to.

I hover around gold to give an indication of my skill.
I don't mind if you're higher ranked either. Means more for me to practice.
If you're lower ranked, and feel less skilled than me, think of it as an opportunity to learn how to play against someone better than you.

(not like i'm any good).

Looking forward to the 1v1s.
